title: Ticket #4396: Minimize overhead of Quill FILESQL logging
description: With the QUILL_USE_SQL_LOG config param, you can request a log of ClassAds reflecting activity in matchmaking and job execution. If the parameter isn't set, we still create the ClassAds for the log, but then don't write them. We shouldn't create the ads if the log's not being written.
check_ins: 2014-Jun-04 11:51   Check-in [40342]: Minimize overhead of Quill FILESQL logging. #4396 When QUILL_USE_SQL_LOG isn't set, don't call into FILESQL or create the ClassAds for the log. (By Jaime Frey )
creator: jfrey
